title: Chilled summer vegetable soup
ingredients: ['1 slice from a white sandwich loaf (several days old)', '1 tbsp red wine vinegar', '600g well-ripened tomatoes, skinned, chopped and seeded', '1/2 cucumber, peeled and diced', '1/2 red pepper, seeded and diced', '1 onion, chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '2 tbsp olive oil', '1/2 tsp curry powder', 'pinch of sugar', '150g whole milk yoghurt', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'shredded fresh basil to garnish (optional)']
